name: ui/button
title: Button
description: Custom button component based on Material UI. For more info: https://material-ui.com/components/button/

className.description: Optional classes are provided. The site and the editor support Tailwind.
className.name: CSS Classes

href.description: Provide a link. Can be both external and internal.
href.name: Link

variant.name: Variant
variant.description: Button variant. Those are custom and based on the original design.

disabled.name: Disabled
disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the button should be disabled. For more info: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_button_disabled.asp
